about_the_game:
This music pack allows you to use music from SENRAN KAGURA 2: Deep Crimson in SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball.

At the Stage Select screen on Story Mode or Free Mode, use the "BGM" option to change the gameplay music.

Tracklist:
1. A Sharp, Quiet Mind
2. The Blood Chamber
3. Like Hot Water Overflowing
4. Bullet Train Thrill Ride
5. It Starts at Hebijo Academy!
6. To the World of Destruction
7. In the Midst of a Solemn Scene
8. Mysterious and Secretive Factory
9. Crimson Leaves and the Flowing River
10. Commoition in the Old Capitol
detailed_description:
This music pack allows you to use music from SENRAN KAGURA 2: Deep Crimson in SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball.

At the Stage Select screen on Story Mode or Free Mode, use the "BGM" option to change the gameplay music.

Tracklist:
